

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
library(here)
library(htmlwidgets)
p <- ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = cut, fill = clarity)) +
            geom_bar(position = "dodge")
p_widget <- ggplotly(p)

p_widget

saveWidget(
  p_widget,
  here("testwidgets", "pw.html"),
  selfcontained = TRUE,
)
```
